value.title: Drive organizational change with Microsoft Workplace Analytics and MyAnalytics
value.excerpt: After using Microsoft Workplace Analytics and Power BI to generate insights about your employeesâ€™ work behaviors, youâ€™ll learn about the Microsoft 365 features that can be tools to implement and measure the changes youâ€™ve identified.
